page.heading: JESUS CHRIST IS GOD'S ONLY PROVISION FOR OUR SIN.
page.ptext1: "God demonstrates His own love for us, in that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us." (Romans 5:8)
page.ptext2: "Christ died for our sins…He was buried…He was raised on the third day,... " (1 Corinthians 15:3-6)
page.pbutton3: He is the only way to God
page.question: It is not enough just to know these three laws...
